languages.text: All injuries and traumas are removed after returning to your flagship.
languages.original_text: Персонаж исцеляется от всех ранений и травм, возвращаясь на корабль.

traits.locale_text: All injuries and traumas are removed after returning to your flagship.
All injuries and traumas are removed after returning to your flagship.
All injuries and traumas are removed after returning to your flagship.

languages.text: Todas las lesiones y aflicciones se curan al volver a tu nave insignia.
languages.original_text: All injuries and traumas are removed after returning to your flagship.

traits.locale_text: Todas las lesiones y aflicciones se curan al volver a tu nave insignia.

languages.text: 角色回到旗舰之后，所有的伤势与创伤效果都会消除。
languages.original_text: All injuries and traumas are removed after returning to your flagship.

traits.locale_text: 角色回到旗舰之后，所有的伤势与创伤效果都会消除。

languages.text: 負傷や外傷は、旗艦に戻ると全て取り除かれる。
languages.original_text: All injuries and traumas are removed after returning to your flagship.

traits.locale_text: 負傷や外傷は、旗艦に戻ると全て取り除かれる。

languages.text: Alle Verletzungen und Traumata werden nach der Rückkehr zu deinem Flaggschiff entfernt.
languages.original_text: All injuries and traumas are removed after returning to your flagship.

traits.locale_text: Alle Verletzungen und Traumata werden nach der Rückkehr zu deinem Flaggschiff entfernt.

languages.text: Toutes les lésions et tous les traumatismes disparaissent au moment du retour à votre vaisseau amiral.
languages.original_text: All injuries and traumas are removed after returning to your flagship.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les blessures et tous les traumatismes disparaissent au moment du retour à votre vaisseau amiral.

languages.text: Персонаж исцеляется от всех ранений и травм, возвращаясь на корабль.
languages.original_text: All injuries and traumas are removed after returning to your flagship.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж исцеляется от всех ранений и травм, возвращаясь на корабль.
Персонаж исцеляется от всех ранений и травм, возвращаясь на корабль.

languages.text: Sancak gemisine dönmenle beraber tüm sakatlık ve travmalar kendiliğinden iyileşir.
languages.original_text: All injuries and traumas are removed after returning to your flagship.
